(2) One sees many such pretzel vendors as this one at Battery Place.

October 1933.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Occupations - Peddlers - Food - Refreshment vendors - Pretzels.

Allen Street, east side, south from the Grand Street Elevated Station.

September 30, 1931
P. L. Sperr.

Allen Street, north from Grand Street, showing prominently demolition on the easterly side of this thoroughfare. View 1 is from the downtown platform of the "El" station and view 2 is at the street level. Note to the left of the former, the cleared area, north of Broome Street.

View 1: September 30, 1931
View 2: October 12, 1931

P. L. Sperr

View 2: October 12, 1931

October 12, 1931.
